looking for a quick and delightful crochet project that's perfect for gifts? look no further! our ear warmer headband pattern is just what you need. it's versatile and can be made in all sizes, ensuring that both little and big ears stay cozy all season long.

but that's not all - if you're interested in the full autumn wheat collection, simply click on the link below!

we've got you covered with our crochet pattern, complete with a helpful video tutorial. following along has never been easier. plus, it's available in sizes ranging from baby to adult, so everyone can enjoy the warmth and comfort.

join our vibrant community of crochet lovers and embark on an exciting crochet-along journey. don't let this opportunity slip away - create stunning pieces for the upcoming chilly months!

what makes this ear warmer truly special is that it's crocheted flat, making it perfect for beginners. get ready to be both comfy and stylish with us today!

✨ what size can i make this ear warmer headband? ✨

✔️ ear warmer - 8 sizes: baby to adult
this ear warmer is crocheted flat.
once you've made your rectangle, we will join the edges with a twisted seam.

this pattern also includes a guide to create the crochet ear warmer with any weight of yarn. this is a great project for diving into your stash and making gifts.
easy peasy!

✨ extra support & tips: ✨
✔️ video tutorials linked on youtube
✔️ join a community of crocheters
✔️ guide to make the ear warmer with any weight yarn.

✨ what you will need to make this crochet ear warmer✨
yarn:
[wecrochet upcycle worsted][1]- 33% alpaca, 34% wool, 33% acrylic, 219yds/100g
colorway shown: sage
weight: 4 worsted
yarn quantities
25 (35, 55, 70, 80) (90, 100, 115) yds
1 ball for all sizes
yarn substitutions listed in pattern.

notions:
[scissors][2]
[yarn needle][3]
[removable stitch marker][4]

crochet hook:
[h (5.0mm) crochet hook][5]
